ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank Dennys Rodriguez De Gracia for epidemiological information, Paola Cordoba, Leyda Abrego, Juan Castillo Mewa, and Claudia Gonzalez for technical help, and Alberto Cumbrera for the map. Jeymy Trujillo, Ruth Helleby, and ICGES administration for administrative support. S.L.-V. and B.A. are members of the Sistema Nacional de Investigaci√≥n (SNI) from SENACYT from Panama.
